engelsk: to go to sleep, go to bed
to mean, intend; believe, think, be of the opinion
first of all, first and foremost
may, get to, be allowed to
Who knows, I wonder; say it
to be valid, apply, concern, count
even though, despite the fact that
to put up with, endure, bear, stand
to catch, reach, be enough, suffice
watch out, make sure, take care
